welcome.title: Welcome to our application
welcome.message: This is a demonstration of how to integrate next-intl for internationalization, next-themes for dark mode support, and shadcn/ui for beautiful components in a Next.js application.

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.details: Easily add support for multiple languages with next-intl library.

theming.title: Theming
theming.details: Switch between dark and light mode with system preference detection.

components.title: UI Components
components.details: Pre-built accessible components that work perfectly with next-themes.
